ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is Allah's favour which He gives to whoever He wills. Allah's favour is indeed immense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is the bounty of God, He gives whosoever He please. God is master of great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such is Allah's favour: He bestows it on whomsoever He pleases. Allah is the Lord of abounding favour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such is the favor of God which He grants to whomever He wants. God's favor is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That is the grace of Allah, which He bestows on whom He wills. And Allah is the Owner of mighty grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That is Allah's grace; He grants it to whom He pleases, and Allah is the Lord of mighty grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is the bounty of God; He gives it to whom He will, and God is of bounty abounding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That is the bounty of Allah; which He giveth unto whom He will. Allah is of Infinite Bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That is God's grace; He bestows it on whom He pleases; for God is limitless in His grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That is the grace of Allah: He vouchsafeth it on whomsoever He will. And Allah is the Owner of mighty Grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is Allah’s grace, which He grants to whomever He wishes, and Allah is dispenser of a great grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such is the Bounty of Allah, which He bestows on whom He will: and Allah is the Lord of the highest bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That is the Grace of Allah, which He bestows on whom He wills. And Allah is the Owner of Mighty Grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such is the Favor of Allah; He gives it to whom He will, and Allah is of abounding favors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is God’s grace, which He grants to whomever He wills. God is Possessor of limitless grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [62:4]   That is the bounty of God, which He gives to whom He will — [such as] the Prophet and those mentioned with him — and God is [dispenser] of tremendous bounty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That) which I have mentioned regarding prophethood, Scriptures and the confession of Allah's divine Oneness (is the bounty of Allah) is a bounty from Allah; (which He giveth unto) and honour with (whom he will) whoever deserves it. (Allah is of Infinite Bounty) by bestowing Islam and prophethood upon Muhammad (pbuh); and it is also said this means: by bestowing Islam upon the believers; and it is also said this means: by sending the Messenger and Scripture to His created beings.
